item.title: Raichur PSI seen dancing to DJ music during Ganesh immersion, video goes viral
item.description:
<![CDATA[12 minutes ago Dharmasthala case: Complainant-turned-accused Chinnayya sent to judicial custody
26 minutes ago Sasikanth Senthil files defamation case against MLA Janardhan Reddy for linking him with Dharmasthala case
1 hour ago Hurry up! Only 4 days left to send reels for Udayavani.com’s “Nammane Krishna” contest
1 hour ago Reddy demands CBI probe into propaganda case, alleges Left involvement and government support for Senthil
2 hours ago Koppal: Why are BJP leaders afraid of ballot paper,...]]>
